!https://gopeed.com !Test Statushttps://github.com/GopeedLab/gopeed/actions?query=workflow%3Atest !Codecovhttps://codecov.io/gh/GopeedLab/gopeed !Releasehttps://github.com/GopeedLab/gopeed/releases !Downloadhttps://github.com/GopeedLab/gopeed/releases !Donatehttps://docs.gopeed.com/donate.html !Discordhttps://discord.gg/ZUJqJrwCGB <a href="https://trendshift.io/repositories/7953" target="blank"><img src="https://trendshift.io/api/badge/repositories/7953" alt="GopeedLab%2Fgopeed | Trendshift" style="width: 250px; height: 55px;" width="250" height="55"/></a> !ko-fihttps://ko-fi.com/R6R6IJGN6 English | 中文 | 日本語 | 正體中文 | Tiếng Việt 🚀 Introduction Gopeed full name Go Speed, a high-speed downloader developed by + , supports HTTP, BitTorrent, Magnet protocol, and supports all platforms. In addition to basic download functions, Gopeed is also a highly customizable downloader that supports implementing more features through integration with APIs or installation and development of extensions. Extension Gopeed also provides a browser extension to take over browser downloads, supporting browsers such as Chrome, Edge, Firefox, etc., please refer to: https://github.com/GopeedLab/browser-extension 💝 Donate If you like this project, please consider donating to support the development of this project, thank you! 🖼️ Showcase !docs/img/ui-demo.png 👨‍💻 Development This project is divided into two parts, the front end uses , the back end uses , and the two sides communicate through the protocol. On the unix system, is used, and on the windows system, protocol is used. > The front code is located in the directory. 🌍 Environment 1. Golang 1.23+ 2. Flutter 3.24+ 📋 Clone 🤝 Contributing Please refer to CONTRIBUTING.md 🏗️ Build Desktop First, you need to configure the environment according to the official Flutter desktop website documention, then you will need to ensure the cgo environment is set up accordingly. For detailed instructions on setting up the cgo environment, please refer to relevant resources available online. command: - windows - macos - linux Mobile Same as before, you also need to prepare the environment, and then install : command: - android - ios Web command: ❤️ Credits 👥 Contributors <a href="https://github.com/GopeedLab/gopeed/graphs/contributors"> <img src="https://contrib.rocks/image?repo=GopeedLab/gopeed" /> </a> 🏢 JetBrains !golandhttps://www.jetbrains.com/?from=gopeed 📄 License GPLv3
